page.title: 20MISS BRADER REMEMBERS
page.content: did bills in his book and he has also done poems. There was also a butcher who came to the Coach and Horses pub in Hemingby to sell his meat and other food like pies and other kinds of foods. Miss Brader remembers when there used to be a mill in Hemingby.Mr Burnet used to be the baker. The mill ground the wheat till it was flour then the baker would bake bread buns and bread loaves then he would go round the villagers. But the mill closed down because they found a better method of grinding corn.After a while the mill burnt down but they didnt know who started it or whether it was natural causes.
